document_data.name: Elion
document_data.caption: ''Map of Elion and the surrounding area.''
document_data.mainbody: '''Elion''' was a northern fishing town on the island of [[Evermeet]] within the [[Trackless Sea]].
document_data.Government: It was governed by a council elected to settle disputes and maintain order.
document_data.Inhabitants: Most of the villagers were fishermen and kept to themselves. While extremely loyal to [[Amlaruil Moonflower|Queen Amlaruil Moonflower]], the town remained neutral in political and military issues.
